3.unformattedText: Please don't [url=https://en.scratch-wiki.info/wiki/Blockspam]Blockspam.[/url], instead, use the [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/topic/438916/]Scratchblocks Testing Topic.[/url]

4.unformattedText: Please post these types of questions in the [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/4/]Questions about Scratch forum.[/url]
You may want to try using [url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLy4zsTUHwGJIqB6hg-sOxiwsJn7UfuCLw]@griffpatch's scrolling platformer tutorials[/url]
Hi - It looks like you have post this in the wrong forum. In the future - please post these types of questions in the [url=https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/7/]Help with Scripts forum.[/url]
